name: herlang
description: > herlang 小仙女编程语言，使用 Rust 编写。

scripts.wasm:build: rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --bin wasm -Z unstable-options --profile tiny --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --features=wasm
scripts.wasm: npm run wasm:build && (npm run wasm:copy:unix || npm run wasm:copy:win)
scripts.dev: npm run wasm && npm run start
